category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEShowWeldPointsConnectedToConfiguredOutParts
preference.preference_description: Enables the display of weld points when connected parts are configured out, in the manufacturing applications. Valid Values: True - Teamcenter displays weld points even if their connected parts are configured out. False - Teamcenter hides weld points if at least one of the connected parts is configured out.
